sentences.english: Donation of 550 wheelchairs at Qinyang, Henan on May 22, 2008.
sentences.chinese: 天鄰基金會捐贈550張輪椅河南省沁陽市殘疾人士。

sentences.english: The development history, teacher and student resources, reform of the education contents and methods, funds and school-house building of the primary education of Henan province were investigated.
sentences.chinese: 第一部分，主要考察河南省小學教育的發展歷程。

sentences.english: In 771 B. C, the capital was moved eastward to Luoyang in present-day Henan Province.
sentences.chinese: 公元前771年，周的首都東遷到了現河南省的洛陽。

sentences.english: In 2004, Henan's High Court reheard the seed case.
sentences.chinese: 2004年，河南省高院重審了這個種子案。

sentences.english: I was born in the village of Minquan, in Henan province.
sentences.chinese: 在河南鄭州的民權村出生。

sentences.english: Professionalizing social work is needed to build harmonic community in Henan.
sentences.chinese: 河南省社會工作職業化是構建和諧河南的需要。

sentences.english: Professionalizing social work is needed to build harmonic community in Henan.

sentences.english: Because, our house, " Henan people" know.
sentences.chinese: 因爲，我們家的事，“河南人”都知道。

sentences.english: Troops are concentrating south of the river.
Sui county dialect belongs to eastern Henan Dialect.
sentences.chinese: 睢縣方言屬河南方言豫東片。

sentences.english: In which, the teacher of the masses is the major source of staff's amateur educational teachers.
sentences.chinese: 其中，羣衆教師是河南職工業餘教育教師的主要來源。

sentences.english: The latest round of storms also battered Zhengzhou, capital of Henan Province.
sentences.chinese: 最新一輪的暴風雨還襲擊了河南省會鄭州。

sentences.english: The general characteristics of greenstone type gold deposits in Lingbao area of HenanProvince have been analysed in the paper.
sentences.chinese: 本文分析了河南靈寶地區綠巖型金礦一般地質特徵。

sentences.english: 'The situation has been very critical, ' said Mr. Li, 'especially in Henan province.
sentences.chinese: 李方平說，形勢非常危急，尤其是在河南省。

sentences.english: I shall accept the arrangements of Henan University regarding my study.
sentences.chinese: 接受河南大學對學習的安排。

sentences.english: We came to work, because it's better than Henan , he says.
sentences.chinese: 我們是來這兒找活兒乾的，因爲這裏比河南好，他說。
